resources.string: Do you really feel like studying hard?\nBut you can not help playing the mobile phone, can you?
Nothing has been finished because of games and Twitter!
Interesting, every student may do this like you-_-
[iStudy] is a magical App, \nwhich will prevent you from playing the mobile phone when studying!
You can NOT use anything of your mobile phone until the end of the countdown!
And it will send your learning situation to the internet letting others scold as a punishment if you give up studying! ! !
Please choose a website to login first
This is for sending your learning situation to the internet.
Scroll the bottom view if you can not see all of it.
Dear user of MIUI:\nIn the App Info, please allow [Show popup windows] and click [end]. Then restart this App to use it better. Thank you!
You can not use anything of your mobile phone during the setting time.
Accept the supervision of friends in the internet
Please Check the network connection, it is failed.
Well, I am going to study and never play my mobile phone!!!
Well, I am going to study and never play my mobile phone!!!

Well, I am going to study and never play my mobile phone!!!
of studying time~ It will prevent you from playing the mobile phone when studying, download address: http://istudyapp.duapp.com/ ]
Using "Insisting Mode": You can not give up studying.
Using "Supervision Mode": Send your learning situation to the internet letting others scold as a punishment if you give up studying.
Using "No-net Mode": Some functions needing network are suspended.

Only can use one mathematical sign.
The divisor can not be zero.
Succeed in studying without playing the mobile phone~
Show off your learning situation to the internet
Who am I? A super scholar!

Who am I? A super scholar!
Well. . . You should try it once more. . .
#iStudy# is a magical App! It will prevent you from playing the mobile phone! ! ! Download address: http://istudyapp.duapp.com/
You can not give up studying in "Insisting Mode".
You can give up studying but it will send your learning situation to the internet automatically letting others scold as a punishment in "Supervision Mode".
You can use it without the network connection for saving mobile data in "No-net Mode".
You must choose the picture which is suitable for the background and the screen size~
Be better support hardware acceleration if on.\nP.S. Android Platform must be 3.0 at least.
